replies.body: When are the jhin, talon and heimerdinger skins going on sale? I've been waiting for ages.
talon was on sale not even a couple of days ago, as in it came on sale 5 days ago and came off sale yesterday.
Why are epic and legendary skins under the heading Early Sales? They will be in November sale right? Looking forward to the God Fist Lee Sin skin.
Early sales will be available during November, but they will not be 50% off, they will be reduced to 975 and 1350 rp respectively
Just like to confirm. All of these champion sales and skin sales will take place in this month of November group by group? With each sale lasting up to 4 days as usual right? Answer is appreciated.
Yup so its 4 skins and is rotated every 4 days
when is arcade ahri on sale?
For Christmas specials could you do legendary skin discounts or a series?? Also when is Viktor going to be on sale next?
